title: How to write a leave letter for my 1 day leave - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually it helps to know more details like to whom you want to write the application to i.e. your boss or your teacher and why do you need the one day leave. Since you have not mentioned that in your question, let me help you out with a general application. You can add more specific details later on. To, The [Head of Organization/School/College]Name of the organization Subject: Application for leave Respected Sir/Madam; I (Your name, your position in organization or roll no. in class), have to tend to an urgent family matter tomorrow (state your actual reason here) and would not be able to come to work/college. I will resume work/college day after tomorrow and will be available on call in case of emergency. Kindly grant me one day’s leave, I would be highly obliged. Thank you. Yours sincerely (Your name) Date

Address the person in charge. Mr. _____ I would like to request a day off on July ___2018. Please let me know at your earliest convenience if that is possible. I’m needing to ___(give your reason here) and won’t be able to work that day. Thank you. Simple. Ask for the day, ask for a response and give a reason. Follow up a couple of days after submitting the letter.
